title: 赚钱跑路的辅助是不是太多了

replies.author: Kawaii
replies.txt_content: 标题: 赚钱跑路的辅助是不是太多了现在好多赚钱都跑路了根本丢失了MC的乐趣啊

replies.author: 力挽狂澜99v
replies.txt_content: 新年特别多。买一个端。然后圈钱就跑

replies.author: 毛知宇
replies.txt_content: 我都没当过腐竹

replies.author: carryno
replies.txt_content: 一点没有志向 圈个几百块就跑

replies.author: 正义の冷子
replies.txt_content: 腐竹炮路的太多了

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content: 所以说腐竹这条路是个坑嘛

replies.author: 金星登陆者
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: MuChenyu
replies.txt_content: 还要自己辨别好的。

replies.author: 政府机构
replies.txt_content: 仁兄有体验过？

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content: 没遇到            过

replies.author: zxczly
replies.txt_content: 少玩服务器吧

replies.author: YP大黄人
replies.txt_content: 特指yourcraft

replies.author: ll1061793711
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 混世
replies.txt_content: 是啊，你的世界服务器也跑了

replies.author: hyibn5100
replies.txt_content: 开服能赚钱？？

replies.author: ocherry
replies.txt_content: 假期很多圈钱的服吧，可平时又很少人玩

replies.author: etateda
replies.txt_content: 赚完一波跑路 老哥稳

replies.author: wu_sha
replies.txt_content: 确实，都是为了钱，毫无责任感

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
其实赔钱跑路的服主也不少
(虽说未必是在服务器上赔钱的)

replies.author: 爱范希
replies.txt_content: 跑路的都是不会运营的
